data.name: XSheetAuditing
desc: provides methods to access auditing (detective) features in a spreadsheet.

methods.name: clearArrows
desc: removes all auditing arrows from the spreadsheet.

methods.name: hideDependents
desc: removes arrows for one level of dependents of a formula cell.
If the method is executed again for the same cell, the previous level of dependent cells is removed.

methods.name: hidePrecedents
desc: removes arrows for one level of precedents of a formula cell.
If the method is executed again for the same cell, the previous level of dependent cells is removed.

methods.name: showDependents
desc: draws arrows between a formula cell and its dependents.
If the method is executed again for the same cell, the next level of dependent cells is marked.

methods.name: showErrors
desc: draws arrows between a formula cell containing an error and the cells causing the error.

methods.name: showInvalid
desc: marks all cells containing invalid values.

methods.name: showPrecedents
desc: draws arrows between a formula cell and its precedents.
If the method is executed again for the same cell, the next level of dependent cells is marked.
